warezcdn.name: Shuumatsu Nani Shitemasu ka? Isogashii desu ka? Sukutte Moratte Ii desu ka?
warezcdn.title: Shûmatsu nani shitemasu ka? Isogashii desu ka? Sukutte moratte ii desu ka?

imdb.title: Shûmatsu nani shitemasu ka? Isogashii desu ka? Sukutte moratte ii desu ka?
imdb.plot: Five hundred years have passed since the humans went extinct at the hands of the fearsome and mysterious 'Beasts.' The surviving races now make their homes up on floating islands in the sky, out of reach of all but the most mobile...

episodes.title: Broken Chronograph
episodes.plot: Willem Kmetsch lives life as an outcast, like a dead man walking, until he happens to land a job as the caretaker of some rather "special" weapons.

episodes.title: Late Autumn Night's Dream
episodes.plot: Chtholly's bombshell leaves Willem shaken, as he struggles to come to terms with the nature of the "special weapons."

episodes.title: Starry Road to Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Having learned about Chtholly's impending fate, Willem tries to come up with an alternate plan, much to her chagrin.

episodes.title: Dice in Pot
episodes.plot: Having sent his charges into battle, Willem finds the distraction he so badly needs in the form of a visit to cultural hotpot Corna di Luce.

episodes.title: From Dawn Till Dusk
episodes.plot: Phyr details her request to Limeskin, who refuses and asks Willem for a favor of his own.

episodes.title: No News Was Good News
episodes.plot: Willem learns a lot from Souwong and makes a stand. Meanwhile, Chtholly continues to hear the voices in her head.

episodes.title: Home, Sweet Home
episodes.plot: The warehouse has to deal with the ramifications of Chtholly's condition. At the same time, things begin to unravel on the surface.

episodes.title: Slight Light, Slight Hope
episodes.plot: As the situation on the surface continues to simmer, Chtholly struggles to come to terms with her new life.

episodes.title: Moonlit Sorcery
episodes.plot: Things continue to get worse for Chtholly, who bravely decides to live in the moment. Meanwhile, the rescue operation to the surface finally begins.

episodes.title: My Happiness
episodes.plot: Chtholly helps out around the base as his secretary and gains the adulation of everyone there. Willem, on the other hand, starts having doubts about some unanswered questions after meeting Nopht and Rhantolk.

episodes.title: Evidence of Existance
episodes.plot: The situation on the surface heats up as a massive cave is found beneath Gomag City, and lying there is something very unexpected.

episodes.title: Chtholly
episodes.plot: A desperate battle unfolds upon the Saxifraga as it tries to escape the attack of timere. Chtholly, clinging to the last pieces of emotions she still possesses, decides to fight.
